Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I\'ve seen all your requests for a shoutbox in the forums and I investigated how to put one. So, I\'m happy to announce that now is available one Shoutbox in KSP Forums

Enjoy it! :sos:

Cheers
The Shoutbox is showing a picture of a timer, and does not do anything else. Anyoune else having it working/not working?

Well, it doesn\'t work on the school computers, due to their pop-up blocking.

What\'s a shoutbox, anyway?

Hello everyone!

I\'ve seen all your requests for a shoutbox in the forums and I investigated how to put one. So, I\'m happy to announce that now is available one Shoutbox in KSP Forums

Enjoy it! :sos:

Cheers

Thanks aLeXmOrA

Too bad it defaults to 'on'

That thing is annoying and I have to minimize it every time I come to the forum now.

Too bad it defaults to 'on'

That thing is annoying and I have to minimize it every time I come to the forum now.

I enabled the Auto-hide property for the Shoutbox, so it will minimize when you first load the forum\'s index page.

Cheers
